titleStmt.title: SII 7.774: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 774. (A.R. No. 150 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇarap puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpat taṉ tiruppatumalar maṉṉavar cūṭa maṉṉiya Urimaiyāl maṇimuṭi cūṭi
c ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷarppa veṅkali niṅki meyyaṟan taḻaippak kaliṅkam Iriyak kaṭalmalai naṭātti valaṅko ḷāḻi varaiyūḻi
tiripa Ericuṭaraḷavu morukuṭai niḻaṟṟa vīrasiṅkāsanattu mukkokkiḻāṉaṭikaḷoṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripanmarāṉa tribhuvaṉacakravattikaḷ
vikkiramacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu paṭṭānpākkaināṭṭu vāṉavaṉmātevipuram cāttiṉa paricāvatu
vāymaṭaippaṭi nilam Eḻunūṟ ṟorupat teḻaraiye mākāṇiyiṉāl poṉ Āyirattu muppat taiṅkaḻañce nāṉmāvarai Eḻāvatu celavāṉa mā
ṭai Āyirat teḻunūṟṟu Eṇpat tiraṇṭu Itanuḷ Ivvūr kāṇiyuṭaiya veḷiyūruṭaiyāṉ veḷā ṉiṟaṇintānāṉa vīranārāyaṇa muventaveḷāṉum
veḷiyūruṭaiyān Ampalava ṉiṟain=tāṉum nāyaṟukiḻavaṉ maṟaikkāṭaṉ ṉārāyaṇaṉum kuḷakkuṭaiyān kuṭṭeṟan māyilaṭṭiyum veycālipā
ṭināṭṭu muven=taveḷāṉum vaṭaceriyuṭaiyān pantaṇaṉ periyāṉum Uḷḷiṭṭārpakkal Ivvūr Utavittirumāṇikuḻimahādevaṟ
Ātitāsaśaṇṭeśvarar vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya piramāṇappaṭi tiruvayintirapurattāḻvār tevatānam pirakattellaik
ku meṟkum keṭilattu nīroṭukālukku teṟkum mānakānataleṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭa Oṭaiyiṉ melācaṟutikku
kiḻakkum kaṅkaikoṇṭārveṭṭikku vaṭakkum naṭuvuṭpaṭa nilamāy Ittevarkku veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuk
kaikku muṉṉuṭaiyārum paḻampeyarum nakaramāy varukiṉṟapaṭiyun tavirttu vikkiramacoḻanallūreṉṉum tiruṉāmattāl yā
ṇṭu muṉṟāvatumutal veṟupiṟin=ta nirnilam patte mukkāle kāṇi puncainilam Aiympattiraṇṭarai In
nilattil Ittevar śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum maṭaiviḷākamum Uḷḷiṭṭu niṅkum nilam Oṉṟekāl
nikki nilam Aiympattoṉṟe kāl Ākap puṉcey Uṭpaṭa nilam Aṟupattiraṇṭe kāṇiyināl nilavopāti po
ṉ patinaiyṅkaḻañcarai Eḻāvatu celavopāti māṭai nūṟṟaympattiraṇṭaraiye mummāvaraikkum Ivvūr muṉpu
nirnilattukkum puncainilattukkum Iṟaikaṭṭinapaṭikkuk kaṇakku kaṇṭilāmaiyil coḻakulavallinallūrkku Iṟaikaṭṭiṉa Opāti poṉ muppattirukaḻañcaraiye muṉṟumañcāṭiyum Eḻumā varai
Eḻāvatu celavopāti veli Oṉṟukku māṭai Aiñcemukkāle Iraṇṭumāvaraikkāṇikkiḻarai Āka māṭai Aṟupattumuṉṟe nālumā puncainilam Aimpattoṇṟekālukku ve
li Oṉṟukku nel mukkalamāka nel nūṟṟaiympattumukkalane Irutūṇikkuṟuṇiyināl māṭai pattoṉpate Eḻumā Āka māṭai Eṇpattiraṇṭarai nikki vāṉavaṉmāte
vipuram nilam Aṟunūṟ ṟaimpattunāle Āṟumāvināl Āyirat torupattoṉpatin kaḻañce nālumañcāṭiyum nāṉmāvarai Eḻāvatu celavopāti māṭai Āyirat taṟunūṟṟu
t toṇṇūṟṟoṉpatarai Ivvūrniṉṟumpiṟin=ta nilattukku tara maṟintilāmaiyil taramaṟintu tarave
The record is built in after this portion.
Digital edition of SII 7.774 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
